text: Hello how are you today?
I'm well, thanks
Great, what type of movies do you like
I like a lot of different movies.Let's try drama
What was the last movie you watched?
A Clockwork Orange, I think. Can you recommend a movie like that?
What did you enjoy most about A Clockwork Orange
I liked that it was a Kubrick movie, of course. And that it was inventive
and what do you least enjoy about the film?
I don't know. I guess the future portrayed seemed a little dated
I think you may enjoy another film from Kubrick
OK, let's hear it
Full Metal Jacket
That's a good one. I accept
Perfect enjoy the trailer
Ok thanks
It is an excellent movie
Yes, it is. I've seen it before
Enjoy it
I'm sure I will
Hello
Hi, I would like to get some movie recommendations
Ok, tell me what type of movies do you like to watch and in what genre.
I love superhero movies.
Superhero movies are always good to watch have you seen any movies lately.
I've seen all the Marvel Cinamanic Universe movies (MCU) and last night I saw Shazam!
I have seen Shazam too it was really good and had a bit of comedy added to it I especially like how much trouble he got into while testing out his powers.
I loved the comedy part of it too. I usually don't like DC movies because they lack humor, but this movie had that.
Since you said that you love Superhero movies would you like to see a movie trailer that I would recommend I think you would find it to be very exciting to watch.
Yes please.
I would recommend that you see the Dark Phoenix movie trailer.
That's actually a movie I have not seen yet, even though I've seen a lot of the X Men movie. Thank you!
So you would like to watch this movie trailer, great if you do it will not disappoint.
Yes. I just watched it. It looks great. Thank you!
Thank you for watching it, do you think you will go see the movie.
Yes, I think I will.
Great, I really enjoyed it when I did.
Thank you for your help. I am excited to see Dark Phoenix. You have been a big help!
Well, I have seen a lot of the X-Men movies over time and this one was really good to watch and I was definitely engaged in the movie the entire time.
Thank you so much again. I really didn't think there were a lot of movies that I would like to see. I hope you have a wonderful holiday season!
Hello.
Hello
I'm here to discuss movie preferences with you. What is the most recent movie you have seen? My most recent is IT chapter 2.
Frozen 2
My daughter want's to see that, I might actually be taking her this weekend.
Saw it last night. It was good. I still thought the first one was better though.
That can often be the case with some series. Like Men in Black, I still think the 1st was the best.
Same here
What do you think is next on your list to see? I think I am waiting for Star Wars The Rise of Skywalker.
That's probably going to be my next, unless my wife can talk me into Mr. Roger's Neighborhood.
What's your all time favorite movie? Mine is the Shawshank Redemption.
Ooh, that's a tough one. It may be Raising Arizona.
Yeah. I too have many close seconds, but the story in Shawshank Redemption is just great to me. Hard to find movies today that are just a great story and not all action and graffics.
Yes, I love that movie too. Also Braveheart, Saving Private Ryan (big Tom Hanks fan)
Yes. Tom Hanks has been great in a variety of rolls. I especially liked him in The Green Mile.
Another good one. Big may be my all time favorite of his, and Joe vs. the Volcano close second.
Toy Story 4, think you will see that?
My wife wants to take our son to it. He may be a little young still so not sure.
My daughter has loved all the Toy Story Movies, I think he'd enjoy it.
Ok. I think we may try it then. Thanks for the suggestion.
Indeed. It's been a pleasure talking to you!
Hello!
Greetings, how are you?
I am fantastic! Hope you are too. Have you watched any good movies lately?
Not really, I'm looking for something to watch though, can you recommend something? In the mood for a superhero movie.
Yes, I highly recommend Avengers End Game. This movie was great and full of action. Have you heard of it?
I've heard of it, haven't seen it. It's one with Iron Man?
Yes, Iron Man, Black Widow, Captain America, Thor and many more. It's a really good movie and if you like superhero this is perfect.
Wow, it's got a bunch of superheroes. I'm guessing it's a Marvel movie?
Yes, it is a Marvel movie. I love that Robert Downy Jr. stars in it too. I really enjoyed watching the Iron Man series. I surely hope you watch it because I believe you would really enjoy that movie.
I like Robert Downey Jr., he was great in Iron Man. You said it's called Avengers End Game, wondering if I should start at the beginning of the Avengers movies.
Probably a good idea so you have the basis.
Does it also include the Incredible Hulk? Seems like he's also a Stan Lee creation. I used to watch the series back in the early nineteen eighties.
Yes, the Hulk comes out to play in end game. I love Stan Lee he was such an awesome creator.
I like it how Stan Lee makes cameos in a lot of Marvel movies. I've got nothing to do this week, I'll probably watch the Avengers movies.
I love that about Stan. I recommend you watch the Avengers End Game trailer. Would you be interested in watching it?
Yes, I accept your recommendation of the Avengers End game.
Awesome! I surely hope you enjoy it :)
If it's called end game, does that mean it's the last one? If it's good, I hope they continue making more somehow
No it is not the last one. It's part of phase 3. It's funny and interesting how all these movies intertwine with one another.
You got me very interested in this series, I look forward to watching them. Thank you for your advice
You're welcome.
I need to go, have a nice day.
Hello, how are you?
hi im good you
What kind of movies are you interested in
horror, one that challenges me to open my eyes to things i dont see naturally
What was the latest horror movie you watched?
i believe inception and Mirrors
Inception with leanordo dicaprio?
I have also watched incidious really likes that one
Have you ever seen Zombieland?
no i havent whats it about

It is about a set of survivors that have to make their own way after a Zombie apocalypse. It mixes horror and comedy at the same time, it is not your usual zombie movie. It stars Woody Harrleson and also co-stars Bill Murray
oh ok thats cool. i dont like the mix of horror and comedy much though
You should give this one a try though. It is famous for the pharse of Double Tap when it comes to Zombie killing.
ok is it scary like incidious or thriller walking dead
Hmmmm, I would say it is more like Walking Dead. If that is not your preference, have you seen the new IT movie?
no i havent whats that about. i may watch zombieland at a seperate time

IT is adapted form teh Stephen King book of the same name. It is about a group of kids that are chaed by a demon that manifests itself as an evil and Bloodthirsty clown. It was originally a TV mini-series back in the 90s...but then was made into a feature film last year. There is a sequel out now called IT, Chapter Two. This is a pretty scary movie by comparison.
ok yes i may watch that one
Ok, well enjoy IT and Zombieland!
Thank you
Hey, I am here to help you look for a movie trailer.
Hi! What movies do you recommend?
Well, that all depends on what kind of movies interest you.
I like comedies, rom-coms, etc. I also love documentaries.
Could I ask what was the last movie that you watched?
The last movie I watched was Bridesmaids.
I watched that with my girlfriend and it was hilarious. I want to recommend a rom-com called Last Christmas. It stars Emilia Clark from Game of Thrones. I really like her.
Sounds like a good movie for the holiday season! I accept your recommendation.
That sounds great!
Do you have any other recommendations?
You said that you liked documentaries, so which type of those is your favorite
I recently watched the two documentaries about the Fyre Festival on Hulu and Netflix and liked both of those. I like things related to current events and I also love true crime docs
I also really enjoy true crime docs. One of my favorites is Making A Murderer, would you be interested in seeing that trailer?
Yes! I have been meaning to watch that one.
Unfortunately the Making A Murderer trailer is unavailable, I can continue to find a documentary trailer that might interest you or we could try something else.
Sure, we can try other documentaries.
I may have just what you are looking for. It is very similar to the fyre festival doc. It's called The Inventor: Out For Blood In Silicon Valley. I really recommend this one.
movie: The Inventor: Out for Blood in Silicon Valley (2019)
movie_name: The Inventor: Out for Blood in Silicon Valley

text: That sounds really interesting; what's it about?
It's about a woman who is creating a new piece of technology that could revolutionize modern medicine, and all the twists and turns in trying to develop something that could change the world.
I'll have to watch that one, too. I also accept that recommendation. Thank you!
Sorry do disappoint you again, but I'm not having any luck finding that trailer either. I think documentaries might not be able to be viewed for some reason.
No problem! Thanks for the recommendation for the Last Christmas movie.
Hello, how are you today? Did you have a nice Thanksgiving? What movies did you get to watch over the Thanksgiving weekend?
I'm good thanks! I had a pretty good holiday. Unfortunately I didn't get to watch any movies but I really wanted to see Knives Out. I might see it later this month.

I haven't got to see it yet either. I have seen the previews and saw the live interview with Jamie Lee Curtis for Knives Out. Agatha Christie mysteries are wonderful. I hope you get to see it later this month from the previews, it is going to be a really great movie.
Definitely. I really like the suspense of the who-dun-it and the cast looks really good too. Do you have any other recommendations that would be similar to Knives Out?
Have you seen Game Night with Jason Bateman and Rachel McAdams? It is a murder mystery, also.
I have not! Murder mystery is exactly what I'm looking for, can you tell me a little more about the movie?

The movie follows a group of friends who participate in a couples game night every week. Maxs brother hosts a murder the stakes get invariably raised when he gets kidnapped. As Max, Annie and their competitive couple-friends set out to solve the mystery and rescue Brooks, they discover something unknown about Brooks and the game. The movie received praise for its tight plotting that delivered genuinely shocking twists and turns and its ability to land silly humor at the same time.
That sounds pretty interesting, I might have to check it out. Does it have a romance plot in the movie?
Jason Bateman and Rachel McAdams play Max and Annie who are a couple in the movie.
That's good, I enjoy movies that have a romantic touch to them. You know what? You've convinced me, I am definitely going to watch this movie. I accept your recommendation!
That's marvelous. I hope you enjoy it.
Thanks! If I enjoy that movie, are there any others that I should check out?
Do you like older mystery movies? Or the newer ones only?
I like both! But I'm interested in hearing about older ones

You would probably like Mirror Crack'd if you like Agatha Christie. Angela Lansbury play's Miss Marple in a quaint British town. Rock Hudson, Elizabeth Taylor in her last role and Tony Curtis are, also lead roles in this mystery movie.
Those sound very cool, do they have a lot of action in them?
Probably no as much as you the would like with Angela Lansbury. You might like Murder on the Orient Express better with Poirot.
I think I've heard of that one. It has Judi Dench right? I enjoy her movies a lot. Does that movie have a good cast with her?
It has the following cast: Olivia Colman, Penlope Cruz, Willem Dafoe, Daisy Ridley, Leslie Odom Jr., Josh Gad, Michelle Pfeiffer, Lucy Boynton, and Johnny Depp. You be the judge of the cast.
That sounds very good! I accept your recommendation. Thanks so much! I think I will enjoy both of those movies.
Hi!! How are you doing this evening?
Hi i am well how about you
I am amazing, thank you for asking! I am here to help you pick a movie trailer
I like movies about world war ii
World War II Movies are great!. What is the last WWII movie you watched?
i saw midway
Are you wanting a similar story line to Midway or you looking for something a bit different?
similar storyline
Got it
do you have one in mind?
Have you ever seen The Pacific?
no but i accept your reccommendation
Great!. It's got so much Action and History that you will just love!
i hope i love it
You will. Is there anything else I can help you with?
not that i know of
You have a great evening and enjoy the movie!
you as well!
Thank you!
i will watch the movie soon
Hello! How are you doing today?
Hey! I am doing well. How about you?
Great! I'm here to help you find a movie trailer. Do you have any movie preferences?
I love comedies and dramas. Do you have a recommendation?
Yes. I just watched Light Night starring Emma Thompson and Mindy Kaling. It was pretty funny and a fun female comedy.
I have never heard of it, but I like both of the actresses. Can you tell me a bit about the story line?

Mindy Kaling's character is a quality control speciality at a plant, but she wants to get into comedy writing. The story centers on her getting a job for Emma Thompson's character, who is a talk show host and really hard to work for.
That sounds pretty good. I accept your recommendation.
Awesome! I hope you enjoy watching the trailer.
Thank you! I am sure I will.
Do you want me to recommend a drama movie as well?
Yes please!
I watched a movie about a month ago that was a drama/comedy that had me dying of laughter. It's called What we did on our holiday.
Interesting. I have never heard of that either. Is it a Christmas movie? Or do they mean holiday as in vacation?
It's british, so they mean vacation. It has David Tennant and Rosamund Pike. They play a couple on the brink of divorce who take their kids to his dying father's 75th birthday in Scotland.
I LOVE David Tennant so I would watch it just for that! I actually think I may have seen the trailer for it. Do you know where I can find it?
I think youtube has a trailer for it. It has some slightly dark humor, but it is so funny.
Perfect! I love dark humor. I will check out both of these recommendations. Thanks!
You are welcome! Glad I could recommend good movies!
Me too! have a great day.
Hi, are you looking for a movie trailer to watch?
Yes. What can you recommend?
Are you interested on any genre in particular? Animatin, or adventure perhaps, the new Star Wars trailer just came out. It has new images of the Knights of Ren
Star Wars is OK. I think people tend to focus more on the effects than the actual movie. I think a good rom com or a good mystery.

Got it, becuse of the season most of your Romantic Comedies will be focus on Christmas, Last Christmas is one of them, it has Emma Thompson on a leading role and it focuses on the love that grows between a boss and an emplyee during the Christmas break
Yes. I'd like to see that movie. I've heard there's a twist, but I don't know what it is.

i really dont want to spoiled it for you, it really looks good, now on to mistery. This holiday season brings a couple of suspense flicks to the screen: one of them is Knives out. with a current score of 98% on rotten tomatoes it is sure to be a hit
I saw that one already. It has good parts and a great twist, but it tends to drag.
i understand, so Last Christmas with Emilia Clarke from Game of Thrones interestes you?
Yes, it sounds like a good movie.
excellent, i hope you enjoy the trailer
Thanks. What I've seen has been good so far.
here is a little sniped of the movie
Huh? I don't see the link. What happened to it?

Kate is a young woman subscribed to bad decisions. Her last date with disaster? That of having accepted to work as Santa's elf for a department store. However, she meets Tom there. Her life takes a new turn. For Kate, it seems too good to be true.
Do they say in the movie why she's so inclined to bad decisions?
she(Emilia Clarke) just seem to make bad decision after another. Part of the whole Rom Com thing i guess.
Is it super cheesy like most rom coms, with some speech to a bunch of random people, that most people wouldn't do in real life?
no it really seams to be a good movie, the cast is good and the truth is that movies like this only are good around Christmas. i hope you enjoy your movie
Do you have any other good recommendations?
i just watched Frozzen @ this Friday it was really good, Pretty funny to be honest
Hey there, how are you?
Great! I'm looking for a good movie to watch
What kind of movies do you like watching?
Comedy
What is the last movie you watched and enjoyed?
Disney's Coco
Aw, love that one! My kids love it to!!
Me too! I like cartoons
Im going to find you the perfect movie!!
Thanks so much!
I think I have the perfect movie, I hope you havnt seen it yet!!
What is it?
Despicable Me 2! funny, cartoon and a great movie all around!!
Oh yes! I love Steve Carell
Yes, he is hilarious in all his movies! I really love Miranda Cosgrove, she reminds me of my child hood!
I love her too! Thank for the recommendation-I will watch Despicable Me 2
Perfect, I hope you love it as much as we do!!
Thanks so much for your help. Have a great day!
You have a great day too!!
Thanks again
Hi. What kind of movies are you looking for?
Comedy or Actions are my favorites
Those are both great genres. Are you in the mood for one or the other?
Ehh well honestly I would love to watch a good comedy right now, tough day so need to laugh about stuff haha.
I'm sorry to hear that. Movies are a great way to unwind. Are there any particular actors that you like?

I have quite a few actors that I like, Bruce Willis, Leonardo Decaprio, Jim Carrey, Seth Rogan, Paul Rudd, Tom Hardy, Dwayne The Rock Johnson, Christian Bale, and thats not even scratching the top, if they're a good actor I most likely enjoy them
I recently saw a movie I haven't seen in a long time with Paul Rudd. Have you seen This is 40?
Yeah I've seen This Is 40, I guess im looking for something a little more released in the last two years comedy movie
How about Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle? You mentioned The Rock and he's in that one.
Actually doesn't sound bad to watch right now, funny and ain't to serious sounds great right now
Excellent. I have a trailer queued up for you when our chat is over.
Sounds great!
So then you're accepting the recommendation? I'll see where it's available.
Yeah i'm accepting the recommendation
Excellent! Looks like it's on Amazon Prime and if you have a Starz subscription it will be on there too. Enjoy!
Awesome, got both. I appreciate it. You have a wonderful night!
You too! Hope your night improves.
Yeah I hope you have a good night also! try not to go nuts doing this haha
It's a fun distraction. But it does seem to be never ending ...
Basically why I started also, a good little distraction from the chaos of the day!! Well again I appreciate you taking the time to recommend stuff to me, and I hope you have a wonderful night!
Hello, I am here to help you looking for a movie trailer, have you seen good movies lately?
I have, but mostly older movies.
Any older movies in particular? How old?
I recently watched The Score which was made in 2001, with Robert DeNiro and Edward Norton, directed by Frank Oz. It was excellent.
I like Robert De Niro, I saw that he has a movie coming out on Netflix called The Irishman. Tempted to watch it.
I'm not familiar with that one, is it a Scorcese movie?
Yes it is. Martin Scorsese and Robert De Niro have made a lot of movies together, nine I think.
Interesting, is it a crime-drama type film?
I believe so, it's described as an epic crime film
Has it already been released in theaters?
It was released on November 1, 2019.
Wasn't there another recent Scorcese film, Motherless Brooklyn? Or was that a different director?
Motherless Brooklyn was directed by Edward Norton. Starring Bruce Willis
Okay, I must have been thinking about an interview with Scorcese that mentioned Motherless Brooklyn. Did Motherless Brooklyn receive positive reviews?
One critic said it requires a lot of patience to watch, but it has strong performances, and an interesting perspective. Most of the critics say it's an average movie.
How has The Irishman been received critically?
The ratings are pretty high, most people giving it around eight out of ten stars. One person called it an epic gangster drama. Sounds kind of typical for a Scorsese film
Okay, I accept your recommendation, I would be interested in watching the trailer for The Irishman
Great, I hope you enjoy it.
Thanks for the recommendation!
Hi im going to try and find you a good movie to watch
Excellent! I love movies that are witty and make you think a lot or challenge you to think about society or whatnot
That's great! Me too! So tell what is something you watched recently and loved?
hmmm lol not a lot of great stuff. I think the last movie that I felt satisfied with was Ready or Not. But I also liked John Wick for the mindless violence and action lol
Noted i'll have to check more into Ready or Not. I am a big fan of John Wick. The first movie that came to mind is Joker. In reference to thinking about society.
Which Joker Movie? The one with Health Ledger or the most recent movie?

The most recent movie. It's just called 'Joker'. Joaquin Phoenix plays the joker from before he is joker and show hows society plays a big role in turning him into a psychopath essentially. Its very dark with good balance of humor. Highly recommend.
Interested. I do love dark movies and dark humor as well. Would you mind being more specific in terms of how they portray societies role? In other words, whom do they take stabs at? LOL

It shows in a lot a way. Just how people treat him. How the rich exploit people for money. It's all there to some degree if you watch for it. There is more im just trying my hardest not spoil anything.

Ha ha ha. Fair enough. My fear with that movie was that it would turn out like Suicide Squad which had great potential but fell far short from expectations. I also stray away from comic book movies, however DC has kept me more entertained with how dark they seem to be. Would you say that this movie would be closer to Suicide Squad, or closer to the Dark Knight?

Suicide Squad was garbage. Honestly i would try and look at this movie detached from the batman franchise completely. Even tho its does have easter eggs for those fans this is way to good to even lump with them. If you're familiar with Joaquin Phoenix expect a quality that only he can achieve. It a performance for sure. Not like health ledger way more real.

EXCELLENT!! you had me sold when you said Suicide squad was garbage! I accept your recommendation. I saw the Director also said to watch it as a completely independent movie as well. Is this movie friendly for the more religious side of ones family? I have a few Zealots and want to know what too expect so I can stave off their constant state of being offended lol.

I don't remember any direct talk of any religion really. But i am biased i'm pretty agnostic so i dont watch for it much. I'd be more worried about becoming anarchist after watching it then any religious aspect.

Noted. Well I certainly appreciate the recommendation! Any other last second recommendations? I mean you love John Wick and the Joker I was already considering but hadn't decided. So, It seems we have similar tastes.

Hmm well as for some solid gems on Netflix, check out Tau and Ex Machina they're both sifi but on the dark side. Also as far Joaquin Phoenix goes the movie 'Her' is fantastic and will make you cry. lol
I have heard of the movie Her. I will also watch that one. I really appreciate the recomendations. A lot of junk out there and no real guidance. Thank you and take care.
I hope you like them. You too.
one last thing!! What is Ex Machina about?
About this guy who goes on a secret job at some genius's house to help him see if his AI passed the turing test.
I was reading about it while you replied earlier an It was not very clear lol . You said sifi, futuristic I presume?
Yes but not to far future. Im a sucker for science fiction. As long as it's good.
I know what you mean by as long as it's good. I was most recently very disappointed in Zombieland Double Tap. I felt they tried to hard to replicate the chemistry and humor but failed miserably.
Hey, I'm here to help you look for a movie trailer.
great, thank you
Do you know what kind of movie trailers you would like to view?
I really like movies based on history or historical figures
What's the last movie you watched and would you want one with a similar story or a different one?
The last film I saw was that Freddie Mercury movie Bohemian Rhapsody
Do you want a movie with a similar story or different one?
Similar would be fine
Since you said you like history or historical figures, I think I have an idea of a movie for you to watch.
That would be great, I appreciate it
What about the movie Judy?
That's a good idea, about Judy Garland, I forgot about that one. Wasn't the actress nominated for an Oscar? I don't know much about Judy Garland, so that would be a good way to learn something too
Yes, that was the actress. So would you like to watch this movie trailer?
I think I would, yes
Are you planning on watching the movie tonight?
I might if it looks interesting, I have no plans
Just so I can make sure I have an extra genre just in case, what genre do you like the most after history/historical figures?
I like crime dramas or mysteries
Yes, I love those as well! Good to know, thanks!
sure, thank you
Since you like crime drama/mystery, I'm going to send you the trailer to the movie Dolores Claiborne. I have a really good trailer of that on hand instead.
Good morning. How are you?
I'm doing well. How are you?
Great! Thank you. What kind of movies do you like?
I prefer comedy and action. I also watch fantasy and childrens movies as I have two young daughters
I have little kids too! We watch kids movies all the time. Have you seen new Frozen?
We have not! I know my five year old really wants to
OMG! You really have to! I have boys and they enjoed it sooo much. It is a super cute movie for adults too.
We will definitely go and see it! I really enjoyed the first frozen. We've watched that probably 20 times since disney+ was released
It is so great. Are your girls into any particular Disney movies? Do they like Toy Story movies?
they like the princesses more than anything. My youngest is really stuck on jessie from toy story right now
Would you like to watch Frozen trailer?
yes i would! The trailer looks wonderful! I will accept your recommendation and take my girls to see it this afternoon. Thank you!
That's great. Hope they will love it as much as we did.
im certain we will. thanks for taking the time to talk to me! have a great day
You too! Be prepared to have to get bunch of Frozen stuff for Christmas.
I havent done much christmas shopping at all. procrastination at its finest
Funny you said LOL I have not bought one thing. I have 2 boys and a little one year old girl. I should probably get busy LOL
my girls are home from school today with a cough and they both just came out dressed as anna and elsa lol this is perfect
Hope they get well soon. Thats great. I hope you will have nice Christmas with your family.
same to you! merry christmas
Hello! How are you?
Hi I'm good. I was thinking about seeing a movie
Awesome! What kind of movies do you like?
I like cerebral thriller/action, foreign films, comedies
I also love thrillers and foreign films! Are you familiar with South Korean cinema? They have some awesome thrillers
I've seen Chan-park wook films, which are actually some of my favoraties
That's really cool! Have you seen The handmaid's tale? It's his latest movie and I really enjoyed it
I've heard of it. Is it like Thirst or Oldboy or any of his other good ones?
It has a much more gothic aesthetic and it has a bit less action than oldboy but I would say it's just as good in its own way
Is the music good? I liked his use of Phillip glass, Vivaldi, in previous films
It's a little underwhelming actually. Have you seen Joker thou? The music is really good on that one and the tone is very similar to Sympathy for Mr Vengeance
I haven't, but I liked the Nolan dark knight and .. Rises too much to taint it. How do you rate Joker and Handmaiden?
I'd say joker is a bit better, the cinematography is really beautiful. It's a bit less action focused than the dark knight but just as good!
Can it easily be interpreted totally separate from th Nolan films?
oh yes, it's a separate origin story that deals exclusively with the joker
I'd see that and Handmaiden. Is handmaiden more positive?
I'd say Joker is better. Handmaiden is a bit slower and it's difficult not to compare it to Oldboy.
I think I will see Joker, thank you
Awesome! It was great chatting with you!
you too
Hi! I'm here today to help you with a movie recommendation! What genre of movies fo you prefer?
I romantic comedies. And, hello!
What's the latest romantic comedy that you've seen?
Brittany runs a Marathon
I've never seen that one before! I'd recommend How To Lose a Guy In Ten Days. It's probably my all time favorite.
movie: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days (2003)
movie_name: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days

text: I'll have to check it out. Who's in it?
Kate Hudson and Matthew McCognehy (probably misspelled but hopefully you understand.) They truly have this on screen vibe and it's wonderful.
Love Kate Hudson. I can take or leave MM, I can't shake the commercials out of my head.
Me either, but I really enjoyed their pairing in this movie. It's really great. I think you'll love it.
Thanks,I'll check it out.
I'll send you the trailer! It's really great!
I'd appreciate it.
I'll send it right over. It's loading :)
still loading?
Yeah, it is! Sorry about that!
It's taking quite a while
I'm honestly not sure what's going on..
I think we're done then.
I guess? I'm not sure. It just won't load.
accept the recommendation

Hello! What movie is it?
It depends on your preferences. What kind of movies do you like?
I enjoy action and comedy. I don't like sad movies
Do you like Dwayne the Rock Johnson?
Very much so
Do you like Kevin Hart
Yes! He's very funny. I like movies when they act together
They have a movie coming up.It is the latest in the Jumanji series.
Oh I loved the first one! I bet this one will be good too. Thank you! I accept this recommendation
Great. It also have Danny Devito and Danny Glover
Danny Devito is very funny. I like when he and the Rock act together. Are there any female leads in this one?
Yes. Karen Gillian. She plays a commando avatar
Has she been in many action movies before?

That's also a funny movie with lots of action. Do you remember who the lead actor in that one is?
Chris Pratt played Peter Quill
He is good at action and comedy.
Yes. Enjoy the trailer. Signing off
hi
Hi there! I am looking for a movie recommendation.
great, do you like action or comedy

here is some info: Actor Rick Dalton gained fame and fortune by starring in a 1950s television Western, but is now struggling to find meaningful work in a Hollywood that he doesn't recognize anymore. He spends most of his time drinking and palling around with Cliff Booth, his easygoing best friend and longtime stunt double. Rick also happens to live next door to Roman Polanski and Sharon Tate -- the filmmaker and budding actress whose futures will forever be altered by members of the Manson Family. Release date: July 26, 2019 (USA) Director: Quentin Tarantino
